text: Julianne Hough, is best known for being a professional dancer turned judge on ABC's ` ` Dancing With the Stars.'' But her moves go beyond TV. Hough has taken on dance - heavy roles in movies like ` ` Footloose'' and ` ` Burlesque,'' and performed in the ` ` Move Live Tour'' with her brother Derek Hough. In order to keep up on the floor, Hough makes fitness a big part of her life. She is also a big fan of her Fitbit and an ambassador for the company, tracking her steps and workouts.
